text: Alexander Belsyre, D.D. was an English priest and academic in the mid 16th- century.Historic England A Fellow of New College, Oxford, he was the first President of St John's College, Oxford. He held Livings at Colerne, Osney and Hanborough. He died on 13 July, 1567.Oxonienses (1500-1714): Barrowby-Benn ==References== Category:Fellows of New College, Oxford Category:Presidents of St John's College, Oxford Category:16th-century English people Category:1567 deaths
title: Alexander Belsyre
